mapper.sql: id, object_type, object_id, action_name, progress, status, error_msg, status_log
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_operation_status (id, user_name, object_type, object_id, object_name, operation_name, progress, status, error_msg, create_time, update_time) values ( #{id}, #{userName}, #{objectType}, #{objectId}, #{objectName}, #{operationName}, #{progress}, #{status}, #{errorMsg}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_operation_status SET user_name = #{userName}, object_type = #{objectType}, object_id = #{objectId}, object_name= #{objectName}, operation_name = #{operationName}, progress = #{progress}, status = #{status}, error_msg = #{errorMsg}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name, object_type, object_id, object_name, operation_name, progress, status, error_msg, to_char(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as create_time, to_char(update_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as update_time from tbl_operation_status where id=#{id}
